# The `StringSaver` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Saves strings in the provided stable storage and returns a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> with a stable character pointer. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::StringSaver</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Saves strings in the provided stable storage and returns a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> with a stable character pointer.
